Class MapSector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.egartley.beyondorigins.objects.MapSector

    Sector1, Sector1, Sector2

    public abstract class MapSector
extends java.lang.Object
    A "sector" of map that fills the entire window

    Evan Gartley
